unnormalised: Crop insurance, yaar, it's a lifesaver! Heard Ramesh from Haryana got Rs. 20,000 after the floods on 10/10/2023. My cousin Sita in Bihar faced losses last year on 15/04/2022. Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helped her, thankfully. Applying is still a hassle, though. Kab tak line mein lage raho? 03:00 PM deadline always stressing.
normalised: Crop insurance, yaar, it is a lifesaver! Heard Ramesh from Haryana got rupees twenty thousand after the floods on tenth october two thousand and twenty three. My cousin Sita in Bihar faced losses last year on fifteenth april two thousand and twenty two. Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helped her, thankfully. Applying is still a hassle, though. Kab tak line mein lage raho? three P M deadline always stressing.
